sample.bug_detail_desc: 在結果計算時，先計算出的是低位的結果，但是字串拼接時錯置了result跟新位的位置，造成得到的結果都是相反的，導致除迴文數外的結果都是錯誤的

patchs_eval.reparied_code:
import string
def to_base(num, b):
    result = ''
    alphabet = string.digits + string.ascii_uppercase
    while num > 0:
        i = num % b
        num = num // b
        result = alphabet[i] + result    # the use of concatenation operator in this way ensures that the most recent characters are placed at the front
    return result

import string
def to_base(num, b):
    result = ''
    alphabet = string.digits + string.ascii_uppercase
    while num > 0:
        i = num % b
        num = num // b
        result = alphabet[i] + result
    return result

import string
def to_base(num, b):
    result = ''
    alphabet = string.digits + string.ascii_uppercase
    while num > 0:
        i = num % b
        num = num // b
        result = alphabet[i] + result
    return result
